name: Color & Style
description: Hurry, run out to your local Depot and buy the same crappy cabinets as all your neighbors, that’s so rad of you!!! Now if you want the real stuff you have come to the right place. Our cabinets are all 100% hand crafted & solid wood. Once you feel and see the difference you will never want anything else. Yorkshire Wood offers over 35 diffrent styles of kitchen Doors and cabinets ranging from a simple classic look to sleek Euro-style with modern lines. Whatever your style is bring it home with cabinets built just for you. Yorkshire Wood Construction: Cabinet Box: Walls, Floors, Backs This is what a cabinet is all about; everything else is just there to make it look good, or more users friendly. This is not where you what a cabinet maker cutting corners to save you a buck. We use with 3/4” melamine all the way around. That’s right no down grade for the sides or backs. FACT: Our cabinets are tough. Cabinet Shelves: You guessed it 3/4” adjustable shelves. Whatever you are going to put in your cabinets these shelves will hold it. All Yorkshire Wood shelves are faced with the same hard wood as your cabinets that make your cabinets easy on the ear once opened. Cabinet Interior: White melamine provides a cabinet that’s easy to clean and won’t discolor when using a powerful disinfectant. Cabinet End Panels: No were not just going to throw a piece of veneer on the side of you cabinets and call it good. We like to have a little thing called pride and finish the cabinet with a built in 3/4” solid wood raised panel end cap. You will notice the difference for the rest of your life. Cabinet Face Frames: Stiles, railed, and face frames are crafted of premium, 3/4” thick solid wood. Each joint is glued and screwed for optimal strength. Door Construction: With over 35 diffident door styles to choice from, our 3/4” thick solid wood doors are built to withstand the test of time. Finishes: We offer a wide variety of stains, finishes, glazes, paint and more so you can get the look you want. All cabinets are priced by the linear foot, and wood type. Shown in Rustic Alder with our dark English Glaze finish Price based off of a 22’ linner kitchen

name: Remodels
description: Your kitchen is the heart and soul of your home. It’s the most improtant statement your house will make. It’s your style, your space, your way of life. Yorkshire Wood offers over 35 diffrent styles of kitchen Doors and cabinets ranging from a simple classic look to sleek Euro-style with modern lines. Our cabinets are 100% soild wood and guaranteed to make you happy. Whatever your style is bring it home with cabinets built just for you. Cabinets are priced by the linear foot, and wood type. Which includes insallation and a $400 credit towards your choice of counter top. For more information please contact us
